title: Add Request Admin Access prompt to UI

requirements.text: Display a 'Request Admin Access' button prominently on the Profile page for users who do not have admin privileges. The button should be visible below the user's profile information.

quotes: There is no prompt to request admin access.

acceptanceCriteria: Button is visible on the Profile page for non-admin users
Button triggers the existing useRequestAdminAccess mutation when clicked
Button shows loading state during the request
Success/error toasts are displayed after the request completes

requirements.text: After successfully requesting admin access, refresh the user's role so they can immediately access admin features without logging out and back in.
acceptanceCriteria: User role is refetched after successful admin access request
User can navigate to admin dashboard immediately after request succeeds
No logout/login cycle is required to see admin privileges

constraints: Use the existing useRequestAdminAccess hook from useQueries.ts
Do not modify the backend main.mo file
Follow existing patterns in ProfilePage.tsx for button placement and styling
nonGoals: Changing the admin access approval workflow
Adding admin access requests to pages other than Profile
